title: Garlic
description: A single white or light brown bulb of garlic. Can be used to talk about cooking, eating, or vampire protection.
apple_vendor_description: This vibrant depiction of garlic, as rendered on Apple devices, showcases plump, pearly white cloves nestled within a papery, translucent husk. The characteristic smooth gradients and subtle shading on Apple's design language give each clove a realistic, almost edible texture. It's a flavorful emoji, perfect for conveying a love of cooking, adding a bit of zest to a conversation, or simply representing delicious ingredients in your digital communications on Apple devices.
